text: Kolkhozny () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Sergiyevskoye Rural Settlement of Giaginsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 77 as of 2018. There are 2 streets. == Geography == The khutor is located 8 km south-west from Sergiyevskoye, 37 km south-east from Giaginskaya and 26 km north-east from Maykop, on the left bank of the Gachucha River. == Ethnicity == The khutor is inhabited by Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Giaginsky District
title: Kolkhozny, Republic of Adygea
